//
//   float4 gEffectUVOffset;

//   bool gEnableMultiUV;

//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   gEnableMultiUV       b0       1
//   gEffectWorldViewProj c200     4
//   gEffectUVOffset      c209     1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, -0.5, 21.991148, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color v1
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_color o1
    dcl_texcoord o2
    dcl_texcoord1 o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0, c201, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c200, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c202, r0
    add r0, r0, c203

mov o0, r0 // Relocated from line 44 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --only-autofixed --auto-fix-vertex-halo ED2DFEF5.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x

    mul r1.xyz, r0.xyww, c0.xyxw
    add o3.xy, r1.z, r1
    add o2.z, c0.y, v2.x
    mul r1.x, c0.z, v2.y
    rcp r1.y, r0.w
    mul o2.w, r1.y, r1.x
    if b0
      add o2.xy, c209, v2
    else
      add o2.xy, c209, v2
    endif

//     mov o0, r0 // Relocated to line 33 with shadertool.py
    mov o1, v1
    mov o3.zw, r0

// approximately 20 instruction slots used
